reviews.review:
Das Spiel ist nicht ausgeglichen und hat Schwachpunkte.
Auf der Überlebenden-Seite findet der Killer einen viel zuschnell und kann sein opfer durch Kratzspuren viel zu leicht verfolgen.
Auf der Killer-Seite wirst du von "guten" Überlebenden verarscht, indem sie bei einer Jagt immer um Objekte laufen und sobald der Kille es schaft an ihnen ranzukommen (Weil er ja ein bisschen schneller ist). stoßen sie eine Palette um oder springen durchs Fenster. Der Killer hat keine Chance ihn zu erwischen. 
Was sich meiner Meinung ändern müsste:
1. Kratzspuren entfernen
2. Killer dafür schneller machen
3. Fenster nach doppelten Gebrauch verflucht (oder so). Hauptsache die springen da nicht die ganze zeit durch.
4. Sobald die Ausgangstore geöffnet sind, kann der Killer seine Opfer mit einen hieb in den Todesstatus versetzen oder direkt packen und töten (Vorausgesetzt das Opfer hing schon zwei mal am Harken).

そしてまともなキラーが来たとしても復帰勢で強い人が多い
でしかもランク20なのに仲間がランク赤(4) 緑(10) 赤(4) キラーはランク15(黄色)とものすごくバラバラ
しかもマッチがクソ長い昔と何も変わってない
鯖のマッチは最低でも5分かかる
もしかしたらGTA5より遅いんじゃない？ｗ
そしてバグ修正しないのにUIとかキャラのモーション変えたりと運営は無能見ててうんざり

あとアプデ時になぜかアプデ分のダウンロード容量じゃなくてダウンロード分+20GBとかいう謎仕様
もっとかんたんに言うと
20GB(元々のDBDデータ)+40MB(ダウンロードした今回のアプデ)+20GB(?????????????)
これは本当に意味がわからないなんて説明したら良いかわからない40MBのデータだけじゃなくてなぜかプラスで20GBが勝手に追加される
そしてインストール終わると謎の20GBが消えるという本当に意味がわからない現象

[i]Some first words: The hours played seem a bit low, but I have played at least six times the amount on other platforms as well, so... I have experience with this game.
I apologize for any language mistakes, as English is not what I speak on a daily basis.[/i]

Dead by Daylight is fun to play with friends, but if you plan on playing ONLY solo, I don't recommend it.
Its not just the MILLIONS of bugs, inexplainable crashes, eternal server problems and the HORRIBLE optimization.
It's also the fact, that BHVR simply does not care about their playerbase (with exception of those who run their socials).
From "discounts" that make you spend just as much money on cosmetics as without it (since auric cells can only be purchased in specific amounts), to ignoring the suggestions of thousands of players regarding changes (MMR for example).
They just do their own thing and get away with it because this game is so unique.
Finally, I want to mention the extremely toxic community of Dead By Daylight. 
From extreme hate towards the LGBT-Community to literal bullying and death wishes against the killers, if they have a life other than playing DbD for 16 hours a day.
The fact its 4v1 makes the killer a very vulnerable target for bullying with little support, since there is no team to "share" the aggression. Instead of a "gg" at the end of the game, you usually get a "ez baby killer" or "camping slugging *insert slur* using op perks".
Im not saying that there is no such thing in other games, but I personally find that DbD is a whole new level of toxicity.
My conclusion is that in a swf (survive with friends), this game is fun as hell, especially in a kyf (kill your friends), where you can goof around all you want with all the perks and items (Plague with mad grit is the funniest thing ever).
If you're playing by yourself however, the chance is very high you'll find yourself with a head ache after some matches because you usually take some insults every 2 or 3 matches and/or die on 1st hook, which is more stressful than fun.
This is the first time I ever had to LEARN, how to have fun with a game, which is kinda crazy.

В целом игра хорошая когда ты играешь за выживших с другом или друзьями а за маньяка интересно играть тогда когда попались рандомы а если вы видите что пати сразу говори левайте ток испортите себе настроение и игру себе всем удачи в этой помойке

DBD is a multiplayer 4 stealthy survivors vs one cruel killer, where the survivors have to fix five generators and then escape through the gate before the killer gets you or where the killer has to hit and grab the survivors and then hang them out onto hooks before they can escape your clutches/
Graphics- Good
Soundtrack- Intense and inspiring 
Audience- Teenagers and Adults
Difficulty- Depends on who youre playing with or against
Story- not really a story
Game time- however many times you wanna play
Price- Its not too expensive, but wait for a sale if you can
8.5/10

эта игра это просто пиздец в это нереально играть ебаная помойка похожая на выжевшего абортыша. ебаная система подбора игроков это просто что нужно сделать что бы так получилось. когда за сурва ищу на +- красных рангах дают ебаных далбаёбов консольщиков который стелсят и не могут играть просто блядь нафармили или взломали эту помойку, играют на 20 минимум ранг или еще как можно ниже. а как я захожу за мана ищу игру дают нахуй реал киберспорт по 5к часов челов пиздец. нахуй эту игру лучше бы не покупал но мне не во что играть и играю во всё говно, но эта игра хуже говна

This game is so bad. There are hackers flying everywhere, and the new mmr system just brings more frustration. You can't really have fun while not having 2l of sweat on your forhead. And not to mention the clear imbalance between the killer and the survivors. Even the devs don't play the game.

In my almost 400 hours of experience in this game I have come to the best understanding I can with how this game lures you in and keeps you hooked on it before sucking you dry and turning you into fellow member of the community that knows nothing but toxicity and complaining about how Spirit is completely busted and needs to be fixed. Basically if you're already toxic and want to be more toxic then this game is perfect for you.
